commands.start: Welcome! I'm a GPT bot created to assist and chat with you. Here's what I can do: • Answer your questions and engage in dialogue on various topics • Help with programming tasks and data analysis • Explain complex concepts in simple terms • Generate ideas and propose solutions to problems
commands.start_end: Just send me a message, and I'll try to help!
commands.help: Available Commands: /help - Show this help message /reset - Clear conversation history /reset system - Reset system prompt to default /reset [new prompt] - Set a new system prompt /stats - Show current usage statistics /stop - Stop the active request
commands.stats: Usage Statistics Counted Usage: $%s Today's Usage: $%s Month's Usage: $%s Total Usage: $%s The number of messages in memory.: %s
commands.stats_min: Usage Statistics The number of messages in memory.: %s
commands.reset: History cleared. System prompt set to default.
commands.reset_prompt: History cleared. System prompt set to

description.reset: Clear conversation history, read the help for additional information

budget_out: You have no budget or you have exhausted it.
